title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4065.1 - Racing colors to be registered
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4065.1 - Racing colors to be registered

State Regulations

Racing colors shall be registered with the National

Steeplechase and Hunt Association either annually on payment of $5, or for five
years on payment of $15. Colors so registered shall not be taken by any other
person. All disputes as to the right to particular colors shall be settled by
the stewards of the National Steeplechase and Hunt

Association. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4065.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
